Video.title: Barbell Back Squats
Video.content: Muscles targeted: Legs, lower back and core Instructions: Begin standing with your feet shoulder width apart. Rest a barbell on your back, holding it with an overhand grip. Initiate the squat position through hinging at the hips and bending your knees until your quads are parallel to the ground (depending on your mobility). Lock your hips and squeeze your glutes when you return to standing position. It’s important to keep your core engaged to support a neutral spine and avoid pelvic tilt during your squat. Your knees should not, at any stage, go beyond your toes. A good way to avoid this is by keeping your weight concentrated in your heels.

This will help you to consume high amounts of calories without compromising your health. Also, these homemade healthy smoothies are much better than processed & packed health drinks.

Video.title: Close Grip Bench Press
Video.content: Muscles targeted: Chest, arms. Instructions: Lie on a flat bench holding a barbell with your hands shoulder width apart. Your eyes should be under the bar, in terms of the positioning of the bench in the rack. Lift the bar off the rack and lower it down to your chest whilst inhaling. Drive your heels into the ground, exhale and push the bar back up. Wrist positioning is an important element of a good bench press. Try to hold the bar with a neutral wrist positioning, rather than flexed back. At the bottom of the lift, your wrists and elbows should line up straight, or close to.

Video.title: Dumbbell Walking Lunges
Video.content: Muscles targeted: Legs, lower back and core. Instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your arms by your sides. Take a big step forward and bend your knees to lower your hips towards the ground. Keep your chest upright and a maintain a neutral spine. The knee of your back leg should not touch the ground. Push back upwards through the heel of your front foot and take a step forward with the other leg. Focus on stepping out of each lunge with your heel and glutes (bum muscles) rather than your quads (thighs) and toes. This will increase the muscle activity through your posterior chain and boost those booty gains! Note: The repetitions, in this case, refer to each leg. So, 10 reps = 20 walking lunges and 12 reps = 24 walking lunges.

Video.title: Stiff Leg Deadlifts
Video.content: Muscles targeted: Legs, back, core. Instructions: Hold a barbell with a neutral/shoulder width, overhand grip. Before you start the movement, you should be standing with a hip width foot stance, an upright torso, and a slight bend in the knees. From here, without increasing the bend in your knees, lower the barbell down the front of the legs. This is achieved by pushing your hips backwards, keeping a neutral spine. Once you feel a stretch through your hamstrings, pull back up to starting position. Avoid leaning too far back at the top of the movement – standing up to straight will suffice.

Video.title: Standing Barbell Press
Video.content: Muscles targeted: Arms, core. Instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder width apart, holding a barbell on your chest. Your grip should be over shoulder with apart and your wrists should be comfortable. Keeping your core engaged, push the barbell up overhead. Inhale as you lower the barbell back down to your chest. People tend to push/flex their hips back to help them push the weight up overhead. This shifts a lot of the load from your shoulders to your lower back. Not only does this make the exercise less effective, but it also sets you up for injury. Before pushing the barbell overhead, ensure your core is engaged and your hips are tucked under to protect your lower back.

Video.title: Russian Twists
Video.content: Muscles targeted: Core, arms. Instructions: Hold a dumbbell between your hands whilst sitting on the ground with knees bent and your ankles crossed. Lift your ankles off the ground so you’re balancing on your tail bone. Avoid rounding your back. Twist through your core to move the dumbbell from the left to right of your body. Try to keep your torso and legs still, whilst you twist through the center of your body. If your legs are whipping from side to side, chances are you’re twisting with momentum rather than using your abdominal muscles. Note: The repetitions, in this case, refer to each side. So, 10 reps = 20 Russian twists and 12 reps = 24 Russian twists.

Thus, you can use high-calorie fruits & vegetables to prepare smoothies at home. To add more calories, you can use seeds & nuts as a topping. This will help you to consume high amounts of calories without compromising your health. Also, these homemade healthy smoothies are much better than processed & packed health drinks.

section.title: Meats
section.content: Meats are an amazing source of protein, iron, healthy fats, vitamins, and zinc, etc. These are great for building muscles & putting on weight. Moreover, these are one of the healthiest calorie-rich foods in the world. By including these in your diet, you can easily gain weight & get into your desired body shape. Some examples of the best meats for weight gain include red meat, chicken, pork, etc. If you are looking to build more of a muscular body, then go for lean meats.

section.title: Fatty fishes
section.content: Fatty fishes are loaded with healthy fats & calories to help you gain weight quickly. Apart from these, fatty fishes are an excellent source of proteins, omega-3s, minerals, vitamins, and fiber. By including these in your diet, you can easily increase your caloric-intake to a huge amount. Moreover, these fishes are a very healthy option to gain weight along with many other health benefits. Some examples of fatty fishes include salmon, mackerel, tuna, herring, etc.

section.title: Nuts
section.content: Nuts are an excellent snack to boost your caloric-intake by a great amount. Nuts are loaded with healthy fats i.e. omega-3 & omega-6, which are effective for weight gain. Furthermore, nuts contain proteins, minerals, dietary fibers, and proteins. Consuming a few nuts can easily contain hundreds of calories, which is really good for putting on weight. The best thing about nuts is that they can be eaten as a snack or as a topping on your favorite dishes.

section.title: Eat 5-6 times a day
section.content: to put on weight quickly, you need to eat 5-6 meals a day. When you eat 5-6 times, you are naturally going to eat lesser food. But you can always add extra calories to every meal to boost your weight gain process. For this purpose, you can add nuts & seeds as a topping on your food. Moreover, you can add other healthy nutrients to each of your meals to keep yourself healthy.

section.title: Avoid low-calorie diet
section.content: Most of the people around the world tend to eat foods that have low-calorie count. These might include popcorns, starchy carbohydrates, fruits, and vegetables, etc. As the calorie count of these foods is low, you cannot gain weight easily. Thus, you need to replace these with high-calorie healthy foods. These foods include butter, cheese, nuts, eggs, and full-fat dairy products, etc.

Video.title: Dancing
Video.content: To maintain modest weight loss, obese people should moderately exercise for 150 minutes every week. This might seem like a lot for some, but it can be motivating for others. However, this goal is attainable by incorporating dancing into your workouts.

Video.title: Aqua Jogging
Video.content: Basically, aqua jogging involves running in the water while wearing a buoyancy belt. You get all of the benefits of running or walking without the impacts associated with them. There may be buoyancy belts available at the pool where you swim, or you can buy one online, then proceed to the deep end of the pool and begin jogging.

section.title: Eat calorie-dense foods
section.content: The calorie-dense foods doesn’t refer to the fried and processed foods that people eat due to good taste. Several healthy-calorie dense foods are loaded with healthy fats, vitamins, proteins, & other nutrients. If you want to turn your skinny body into a curvy one, you need to include these foods in your diet. Some examples of calorie-dense foods include meats, fishes, nuts, eggs, etc. All these foods help in filling your body with healthy calories that can be converted into good fats.

section.title: Drink calories
section.content: To put on weight, you can always prepare calorie-filled drinks & smoothies at home. For most of us, drinking is much easier and convenient than eating healthy foods. Thus, you can use high-calorie fruits & vegetables to prepare smoothies at home. To add more calories, you can use seeds & nuts as a topping. This will help you to consume high amounts of calories without compromising your health. Also, these homemade healthy smoothies are much better than processed & packed health drinks.

section.title: Meats
section.content: Meats are an amazing source of protein, iron, healthy fats, vitamins, and zinc, etc. These are great for building muscles & putting on weight. Moreover, these are one of the healthiest calorie-rich foods in the world. By including these in your diet, you can easily gain weight & get into your desired body shape. Some examples of the best meats for weight gain include red meat, chicken, pork, etc. If you are looking to build more of a muscular body, then go for lean meats.

section.title: Fatty fishes
section.content: Fatty fishes are loaded with healthy fats & calories to help you gain weight quickly. Apart from these, fatty fishes are an excellent source of proteins, omega-3s, minerals, vitamins, and fiber. By including these in your diet, you can easily increase your caloric-intake to a huge amount. Moreover, these fishes are a very healthy option to gain weight along with many other health benefits. Some examples of fatty fishes include salmon, mackerel, tuna, herring, etc.

section.title: Nuts
section.content: Nuts are an excellent snack to boost your caloric-intake by a great amount. Nuts are loaded with healthy fats i.e. omega-3 & omega-6, which are effective for weight gain. Furthermore, nuts contain proteins, minerals, dietary fibers, and proteins. Consuming a few nuts can easily contain hundreds of calories, which is really good for putting on weight. The best thing about nuts is that they can be eaten as a snack or as a topping on your favorite dishes.

section.title: Eat 5-6 times a day
section.content: to put on weight quickly, you need to eat 5-6 meals a day. When you eat 5-6 times, you are naturally going to eat lesser food. But you can always add extra calories to every meal to boost your weight gain process. For this purpose, you can add nuts & seeds as a topping on your food. Moreover, you can add other healthy nutrients to each of your meals to keep yourself healthy.

section.title: Avoid low-calorie diet
section.content: Most of the people around the world tend to eat foods that have low-calorie count. These might include popcorns, starchy carbohydrates, fruits, and vegetables, etc. As the calorie count of these foods is low, you cannot gain weight easily. Thus, you need to replace these with high-calorie healthy foods. These foods include butter, cheese, nuts, eggs, and full-fat dairy products, etc.

section.content: Most of the people around the world tend to eat foods that have low-calorie count. section.title: Eat calorie-dense foods
section.content: The calorie-dense foods doesn’t refer to the fried and processed foods that people eat due to good taste. Several healthy-calorie dense foods are loaded with healthy fats, vitamins, proteins, & other nutrients. If you want to turn your skinny body into a curvy one, you need to include these foods in your diet. Some examples of calorie-dense foods include meats, fishes, nuts, eggs, etc. All these foods help in filling your body with healthy calories that can be converted into good fats.

section.title: Drink calories
section.content: To put on weight, you can always prepare calorie-filled drinks & smoothies at home. For most of us, drinking is much easier and convenient than eating healthy foods. Thus, you can use high-calorie fruits & vegetables to prepare smoothies at home. To add more calories, you can use seeds & nuts as a topping. This will help you to consume high amounts of calories without compromising your health. Also, these homemade healthy smoothies are much better than processed & packed health drinks.

section.title: Meats
section.content: Meats are an amazing source of protein, iron, healthy fats, vitamins, and zinc, etc. These are great for building muscles & putting on weight. Moreover, these are one of the healthiest calorie-rich foods in the world. By including these in your diet, you can easily gain weight & get into your desired body shape. Some examples of the best meats for weight gain include red meat, chicken, pork, etc. If you are looking to build more of a muscular body, then go for lean meats.

section.title: Fatty fishes
section.content: Fatty fishes are loaded with healthy fats & calories to help you gain weight quickly. Apart from these, fatty fishes are an excellent source of proteins, omega-3s, minerals, vitamins, and fiber. By including these in your diet, you can easily increase your caloric-intake to a huge amount. Moreover, these fishes are a very healthy option to gain weight along with many other health benefits. Some examples of fatty fishes include salmon, mackerel, tuna, herring, etc.

section.title: Nuts
section.content: Nuts are an excellent snack to boost your caloric-intake by a great amount. Nuts are loaded with healthy fats i.e. omega-3 & omega-6, which are effective for weight gain. Furthermore, nuts contain proteins, minerals, dietary fibers, and proteins. Consuming a few nuts can easily contain hundreds of calories, which is really good for putting on weight. The best thing about nuts is that they can be eaten as a snack or as a topping on your favorite dishes.
